title: Citibank Hungary's New Premium Personal Loan is Now Available from a 17.9 Percent Interest Rate
summary: Budapest, Hungary - Citibank Hungary's new Premium Personal Loan offers consumers an outstanding opportunity to realize their financial plans requiring funds from HUF 3 million to HUF 6 million. The annual interest rate of the new Citibank Premium Loan is from 17.9 to 19.9 percent subject to status and applies to applications submitted via all channels, including branches, direct sales agents, telephone and online, under contractual terms and conditions.
tag-1: Citibank Hungary's New Premium Personal Loan is Now Available from a 17.9 Percent Interest Rate
tag-2: Budapest, Hungary – Citibank Hungary's new Premium Personal Loan offers consumers an outstanding opportunity to realize their financial plans requiring funds from HUF 3 million to HUF 6 million. The annual interest rate of the new Citibank Premium Loan is from 17.9 to 19.9 percent subject to status and applies to applications submitted via all channels, including branches, direct sales agents, telephone and online, under contractual terms and conditions.
tag-3: Batara Sianturi, Citi Country Officer for Hungary, said: "The key focus in our strategy is to provide our customers with innovative, flexible, secure and convenient products to support their financial goals. We have noted an increasing interest in our personal loans among our customers and target audiences. This demand provides clear evidence that our offerings are highly competitive, and we are gratified that they are addressing various important customer needs."
tag-4: Jon Wiggins, Citibank Consumer Business Manager, also remarked: "Some of our customers told us that they need more funds in special cases to realize some of their bigger scale plans. We carefully designed this new product to address those customer needs. In our sales process we pay attention to provide this opportunity to customers with stable financial backgrounds who are able to maintain control over their finances. We are committed to continuing to offer outstanding opportunities to our customers."
